data.name: Seena VR (Beta)
data.detailed_description:
Seena VR is a multiplayer CO-op survival shooter in VR, Experience the Real Live VR experience in a Battle against large waves of terrorists, defend your territory, and Raise your national patriotism.
Realistic Shooting mechanics and artificial locomotion will push your combat survival skills to their limit as you fight enemy lines across a large variety of maps and combat situations.

Features:

  • Dedicated Servers.
  • Co-op Survival Shooting game.
  • Weapon Simulation.
  • Matchmaking.
  • Touch-pad locomotion.
  • Different maps with different objectives (Soon).
  • Offline/Practice mode (Soon).
  • Voice Chat (Soon).

data.short_description: Seena VR [Beta]: The game features a Deserted map, characters, weapons, and game modes.Feel the VR Experience, Grab your weapon, wear your Armor, and prepare for war.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980, AMD R9 390 equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
